import React, { useState } from 'react' import DateSection from './DateSection' useNavi const AddTodos = () => { const [newTitle, setNewTitle] = useState(''); const [newTime, setNewTime] = useState(''); const saveTodo = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(newTitle) console.log(newTime) setNewTitle('') setNewTime('') } return ( <>
setNewTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Task"/> setNewTime(e.target.value)} placeholder="Select Time"/>
) } export default AddTodos
